877430.name: Задолбали! (Unstoppable Man)
877430.description:
He worked at the local McDonald's. His wife wanted an iPhone. His Dota streams had 0 viewers. He got sick of all of it. Now he is the Unstoppable Man!

Thus game creates a new genre - social drama with violence elements. You will have to take difficult moral decisions, while punishing unscrupulous employers, corrupted police officers, unloyal passions, bad teachers etc. Justice has to be armed!
877430.supported_languages: 英语, 简体中文, 俄语
